title: Massport eyes ‘remote terminal,’ allowing passengers to skip security lines in Logan Airport
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News Passengers would be able to go through TSA screening in Framingham before boarding a secure bus to Logan.
Massport is planning a pilot program where passengers can go through TSA screening in Framingham before boarding a bus to Logan, avoiding lines in the airport.
Illustration courtesy of the Massachusetts Port Authority Travelers flying out of Boston may soon have a new way of avoiding the headaches of security lines inside Logan Airport.

The suspect.
